step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep focusing on placing your hands on your abdomen.
Good work placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
You're doing well with the inhale and muscle tightening. Visualize fluid moving to your chest as you breathe in.
Excellent job relaxing your muscles as you exhale through your mouth. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with your deep breathing! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. Keep visualizing the fluid movement to help with drainage.
